Lets get rid of all 3 main party's.
1 they're surposed to look after the sick disabled vunerable and unemployed plus low skilled people.but now they stop thier disabilatiy money just for fun making people suffer more. they have put more people on the streets .so lets make all party's from now on who have never done a days job not allowed to be mps councillors or hold any other post in goverment.
2 i really belive that the pm and other members of his party have a bet to see how many english people they can murder with their policys.
3 now banks are seeing an up turn in profitslets make them pay up to £1 million for each person who have lost thier jobs and there property and are still suffering because of them up until next election.
